p.k: Already facing ruin, Edward Barbary's situation gets worse when Scrooge demands that his loan is repaid. Amelia is devastated by the loss of Jip but surprised by Compeyson. UK (2015). Cast: Stephen Rea, Tuppence Middleton, Mark Stanley, Robert Wilfort, Ben Starr, Tom Weston-Jones, Omid Djalili, Caroline Quentin, Pauline Collins, Wilson Radjou-Pujalte, Ned Dennehy, Adrian Rawlins, Jennifer Hennessy, Anton Lesser, Ellie Haddington, Alexandra Moen, Karl Johnson, Sophie Rundle, Peter Firth, John Heffernan, Richard Ridings, Bethany Muir, Imogen Faires, Christopher Fairbank, Richard Cordery. Director: Philippa Langdale.
